original_text: So every one of the people cut down his bundle and following Abimelech put it against the stronghold, and they set the stronghold on fire over them, so that all the people of the Tower of Shechem also died, about 1,000 men and women.
korean_text: 모든 백성들도 각각 나뭇가지를 찍어서 아비멜렉을 따라 보루 위에 놓고 그것들이 얹혀 있는 보루에 불을 놓으매 세겜 망대에 있는 사람들이 다 죽었으니 남녀가 약 천 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: So every one of the people cut down his bundle
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 모든 사람들이 각자의 다발을 베어내고

sentences.original_text: and following Abimelech put it against the stronghold
and they set the stronghold on fire over them
so that all the people of the Tower of Shechem also died
